scene_target: Artie survives a confrontation with the Paladin Vane without revealing his 1 HP vulnerability.
goal: Establish Vane as a recurring antagonist and test Artie's 'Perfect Guard' bluff.
conflict: Vane attempts to force Artie into a 'friendly' sparring match to see the 'Anomaly' in action.
constraints: Artie must maintain the bluff about his 1 HP
Vane must use his Masterwork Rapier to intimidate
end_condition: Artie successfully avoids the duel and retreats, leaving Vane suspicious but intrigued.

persona_updates: Artie is learning that a good lie is as effective as a high defense stat.
Artie is developing a deep-seated fear of high-level Paladins.
Artie views 'Perfect Guard' as his primary survival narrative.
Vane is suspicious of Artie's 'Perfect Guard' but wary of the unknown mechanics.
Vane views himself as a maintainer of System balance.
Vane is intrigued by 'Statistical Anomalies' and their potential as viruses.
invariants_add: affiliation: Order of the Golden Ratio

last_scene: Artie encountered the Paladin Vane outside the Mayor's office and was challenged to a duel.
Artie successfully extended his 'Perfect Guard' bluff, convincing Vane that attacking him would result in lethal damage reflection.
Vane backed down but declared Artie a potential virus that the Order would be monitoring.
Artie retreated to the shadows of a merchant stall to recover and plan his next move toward the Low-Level Crypts.
key_events: Artie exited the Mayor's office with the 'Mayor's Cut' quest active.
Vane intercepted Artie and identified him as a 'Statistical Anomaly'.
Vane initiated a 'Friendly' duel request which Artie declined through psychological manipulation.
Artie bluffed that his 1 HP build reflects 200% damage and guarantees crits on counters.
Vane sheathed his Masterwork Rapier and allowed Artie to leave, though he remains suspicious.
Artie's stamina dropped to 14/100 and hunger to 10/100.
Artie and Fizz decided to travel to the Low-Level Crypts to farm evasion gear.
must_stay_true: Artie has 1 HP and 1 MP; any damage taken is lethal.
Artie is carrying the Participation Trophy in his left hand (Soul-bound).
Artie is carrying the Broken Tutorial Sword in his right hand.
chapter_so_far_add: Artie successfully bluffed the Paladin Vane into avoiding a duel by claiming to have a 'Perfect Guard' reflection build.
